_source.text: After a year of being on proper medication and slowly building up my physical strength from the almost nothingit had been, I've lost fat-not a lot, but enough that I've started having hopeful dreams of fitting into old jeans-but at the same time being pretty okay with how I look, both because of being a smaller size and because of having muscle strength and better posture.
